meanings.definition: Any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink to maintain life and growth.
meanings.sent1: Healthy food is important for our bodies to grow strong.
meanings.sent2: I love trying different types of food from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The food at the party was so delicious, it disappeared in minutes!
meanings.sent4: Laughter is the food for the soul, they say.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked bread is like food for the senses.

meanings.definition: Anything that provides mental nourishment or stimulus.
meanings.sent1: Reading a good book is like food for the mind.
meanings.sent2: Positive affirmations can be a source of mental food to uplift your spirits.
meanings.sent3: The interesting conversation was food for thought.
meanings.sent4: Music can be the food that feeds our emotions.
meanings.sent5: Learning new things every day is like mental food for the brain.
